{{velocity}} ## ## Variables ## #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('XWiki.TemplateProviderSheet')) #set ($providerObj = $doc.getObject('XWiki.TemplateProviderClass')) #set ($isEditing = $xcontext.action == 'edit') ## ## Display the sheet. ## ## We set wiki="true" because we use $providerObj.get() which returns some text in the wiki syntax. ## {{html wiki="true"}}
## ## Left side ##
## ## Title ## #if ($isEditing)
#end ## ## Name ##
#if ($isEditing) $escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('xe.templateprovider.templatename.info')) #end
#if ($isEditing) $providerObj.get('name') #else

$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render($doc.getValue('name', $providerObj)))

#end
## ## Template ##
#if ($isEditing) $providerObj.get('template') #else #set($templateDocName = $doc.getValue('template', $providerObj))

$escapetool.xml($templateDocName)

#end
## ## Type ##
#if ($isEditing) $escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('xe.templateprovider.templatetype.info')) #end
$doc.display('type')
## ## Action ##
#if ($isEditing) $escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('xe.templateprovider.action.info')) #end
$doc.display('action')
## ## Right side: enabled spaces ##
#if ($isEditing) $escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('xe.templateprovider.spaces.info')) #end
$doc.display('spaces')
{{/html}} ## ## Go back to the administration ## #if (!$isEditing) (% class="buttonwrapper" %) [[{{translation key="xe.templateprovider.backtoadmin"/}}>>path:$xwiki.getDocument($services.model.createDocumentReference('', 'XWiki', 'XWikiPreferences')).getURL('admin', 'section=Templates')]] #end {{/velocity}}
